dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.
dependencies.name: gmp

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependent_to.description:
Draco is an object-oriented component library geared towards numerically
intensive, radiation (particle) transport applications built for
parallel computing hardware. It consists of semi-independent packages
and a robust build system.
dependent_to.name: draco

description:
Numdiff is a little program that can be used to compare putatively
similar files line by line and field by field, ignoring small numeric
differences or/and different numeric formats.
name: numdiff

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Use GNU Multiple Precision Arithmetic Library
variants.name: gmp
